requests.name: /api/admin/services/single-category/:id/:pagination?
requests.description:
gets data based on the category_id and if an optional parameter is added which is pagination it paginates the value too
note:the header must also carry Authorization: Bearer <token>

requests.name: api/admin/services/create
requests.description:
creates a service  :
        'services' => 'required|string',
        'category_id'=>'required|string',
        'description'=>'required|string',
        'image.*' => 'image|mimes:jpeg,bmp,png|max:8000',
        
      the header must also carry Authorization: Bearer <token>

requests.name: api/admin/services/update/1
requests.description:
updates a service with the id :
'id'=>required for querying data before updating the service
'services' => 'required|string',
        'category_id'=>'required|string',
        'description'=>'required|string',
        'image.*' => 'image|mimes:jpeg,bmp,png|max:8000',
        
      the header must also carry Authorization: Bearer <token>

requests.name: api/admin/services/delete/1
requests.description:
gets the id of the service is sets its isdeleted property to 1 from zero simulating a delete
        
      the header must also carry Authorization: Bearer <token>
